value.string:
# In all cases, return list structure containing tuple of information
 # 1 tuple == 1 group
 # tuple is of the form :
 # [ relative position, title, tooltip, delimiter_type]
 # with delimiter type in 0,1,2
 
 if isinstance(axis_start,DateTime):
 # testing delimiter_type to apply (day, week, month, year)
 # from smallest type to biggest
 type_list = [ ['year', 365],
 ['6months',182],
 ['3months', 91],
 ['month', 30],
 ['1/2month',15],
 ['week', 7],
 ['3days', 3],
 ['day', 1],
 ['6hours',0.25]
 ]
 # default good_type is last one (if nothing else matches)
 good_type = type_list[-1]
 for date_type in type_list:
 # iterating each delimiter_type and testing if it matches the delimitation
 # number definition
 if float(axis_stop - axis_start) / date_type[1] >= delimiter_min_number:
 good_type = date_type
 break
 
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list = []
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(axis_start), 
 'title': '', 
 'tooltip' : str(axis_start), 
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 
 #### Hour ###
 if good_type[0] == 'hour':
 pass
 
 ## 6 Hours ##
 if good_type[0] == '6hours':
 # recovering first valid date
 if axis_start.hour() > 18:
 #need to use the next day
 current_date = DateTime((axis_start + 1).Date())
 elif axis_start.hour() == 0:
 current_date = DateTime(axis_start.Date())
 else:
 if axis_start.hour() > 12:
 hours = 18
 elif axis_start.hour() > 6:
 hours = 12
 else:
 hours = 6
 current_date = DateTime('%s/%s/%s %s:0:0' % (str(axis_start.year()),
 str(axis_start.month()),
 str(axis_start.day()),
 hours))
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if current_date.hour() == 0 :
 delimiter = 2
 elif current_date.hour() == 12:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': '%s. %s %s:00' % (current_date.Day()[:1],
 str(current_date.day()),
 str(current_date.hour())),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 if current_date.hour() == 18:
 #need to use the next day
 current_date = DateTime((current_date + 1).Date())
 else:
 hours = current_date.hour() + 6
 current_date = DateTime('%s/%s/%s %s:0:0' % (str(current_date.year()),
 str(current_date.month()),
 str(current_date.day()),
 hours))
 
 
 ##### DAY ####
 if good_type[0] == 'day':
 # recovering first date displayed, without time:
 current_date = DateTime(axis_start.Date()) + 1
 # first date is used to get list of compliant dates
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if current_date.day() == 1:
 delimiter = 2
 elif current_date.day() == 15:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': '%s/%s' % (str(current_date.month()),
 str(current_date.day())),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 # go to next date
 current_date = current_date + 1
 
 
 ##### 3 DAYs ####
 if good_type[0] == '3days':
 # recovering first date displayed, without time:
 current_date = DateTime(axis_start.Date()) + 1
 # first date is used to get list of compliant dates
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if current_date.day() == 1:
 delimiter = 2
 elif current_date.day() == 15:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': '%s/%s' % (str(current_date.month()),
 str(current_date.day())),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 # go to next date
 current_date = current_date + 3
 
 #### WEEK ####
 if good_type[0] == 'week':
 current_date = DateTime(axis_start.Date()) + 1
 #DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/' + str(axis_start.month()) + '/' + str(axis_start.day() + 1))
 # current date is any day in the week, moving to the first next Monday
 while current_date.Day() != 'Monday':
 current_date = current_date + 1
 # getting list of weeks
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': str(current_date.month()) + '/' + str(current_date.day()),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 current_date = current_date + 7
 
 
 
 #### 1/2MONTH ####
 if good_type[0] == '1/2month':
 # getting first valid date
 if axis_start.month() == 12 and axis_start.day() > 15:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 elif axis_start.day() > 15:
 # need to go to next month
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/' + str((axis_start.month() +1)) + '/1')
 else:
 # need to go to next part of current month
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/' + str(axis_start.month()) + '/15')
 # getting list of months
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if current_date.day() == 1:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': str(current_date.month()) + '/' + str(current_date.day()),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 if current_date.month() == 12 and current_date.day() == 15:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 elif current_date.day() == 15:
 # need to go to next month
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year()) + '/' + str((current_date.month() +1)) + '/1')
 else:
 # need to go to next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year()) + '/' + str((current_date.month())) + '/15')
 
 
 #### MONTH ####
 if good_type[0] == 'month':
 # getting first valid date
 if axis_start.month() == 12:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 else:
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/' + str((axis_start.month() +1)) + '/1')
 # getting list of months
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if current_date.month() == 1:
 delimiter = 2
 elif current_date.month() == 7:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': str(current_date.year()) + '/' + str(current_date.month()),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 
 if current_date.month() == 12:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 else:
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year()) + '/' + str((current_date.month() +1)) + '/1')
 
 
 
 ## 3 MONTHS ##
 if good_type[0] == '3months':
 # getting first valid date
 if axis_start.month() > 9:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 elif axis_start.month() > 6:
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/10/1')
 elif axis_start.month() > 3:
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/7/1')
 else:
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/4/1')
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if current_date.month() == 1:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': str(current_date.year()) + '/' + str(current_date.month()),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 
 if current_date.month() > 9:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 else:
 current_date = DateTime(str('%s/%s/1' % (str(current_date.year()),
 str(current_date.month() + 3))))
 
 
 ## 6 MONTHS ##
 if good_type[0] == '6months':
 # getting first valid date
 if axis_start.month() > 6:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 else:
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year()) + '/7/1')
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if current_date.month() == 1:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': str(current_date.year()) + '/' + str(current_date.month()),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 
 if current_date.month() > 6:
 # need to go to the next year
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year() + 1) + '/1/1' )
 else:
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year()) + '/7/1')
 
 
 #### YEAR ####
 if good_type[0] == 'year':
 # getting first valid year
 current_date = DateTime(str(axis_start.year() + 1) + '/1/1')
 while current_date < axis_stop:
 if str(current_date.year())[3:] == 0:
 delimiter = 2
 elif str(current_date.year())[3:] == 5:
 delimiter = 1
 else:
 delimiter = 0
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(current_date),
 'title': str(current_date.year()),
 'tooltip' : current_date.Day() + ' ' + str(current_date),
 'delimiter_type' : delimiter})
 
 current_date = DateTime(str(current_date.year() + 1) + '/1/1')
 
 return delimiter_list
 
 
 else:
 
 delimiter_list = []
 # secondary axis type is integer / float.
 # building corresponding axis.
 axis_range = axis_stop - axis_start
 step = 1.0 / 1000.0
 good_step = step
 while step * delimiter_min_number < axis_range:
 good_step = step
 step = step * 10
 
 # now adding first value
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : int(axis_start), 
 'title': '', 
 'tooltip' : str(axis_start), 
 'delimiter_type' : 0})
 
 # now going to first good step
 modul = axis_start % good_step
 if modul == 0:
 #axis_start is already well placed.
 current_step = good_step + axis_start
 else:
 current_step = good_step + (axis_start - modul)
 
 # good step is the last step under axis_range.
 if good_step >= 1:
 good_step = int(good_step)
 current_step = int(current_step)
 
 # iterating and adding each value
 while current_step < axis_stop:
 delimiter_list.append({ 'relative_position' : current_step, 
 'title': str(current_step), 
 'tooltip' : str(current_step), 
 'delimiter_type' : 0})
 current_step += good_step
 
 return delimiter_list
